name: Linear Algebra
imgAltText: A set of orthogonal vectors in an inner product space.
description: This course offers a rigorous treatment of linear algebra, including vector spaces, systems of linear equations, bases, linear independence, matrices, determinants, eigenvalues, inner products, quadratic forms, and canonical forms of matrices. Compared with [_18.06 Linear Algebra_](/courses/18-06sc-linear-algebra-fall-2011/), more emphasis is placed on theory and proofs.
descriptionHtml: This course offers a rigorous treatment of linear algebra, including vector spaces, systems of linear equations, bases, linear independence, matrices, determinants, eigenvalues, inner products, quadratic forms, and canonical forms of matrices. Compared with 18.06 Linear Algebra, more emphasis is placed on theory and proofs.
